plot: Kris worries that Bruce is spending too much time alone at the Malibu beach house. She schedules a yoga class, a rock climbing session and even a family cooking lesson, but Bruce doesn't appreciate her meddling. Can Kris get him out of the bachelor pad and back into the fold? Meanwhile, Scott inherits a painting from his parents that could be worth a fortune. Find out if he and Kourtney have struck it rich or been duped!—Anonymous
